Package com.example.qrhunt

Class FireDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.qrhunt.FireDatabase
  • public class FireDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is in charge of connecting/writing and reading from database

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      FireDatabase​(java.lang.String uuidInput)
      Constructor method.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addNewQRCode​(GameQRCode newCode)
      This method will add the new QRCode the player get to the database.
      void addOrUpdatePlayer​(Player player)
      This method will update our database when we need to add players to the databse or updated a specific information in the database.
      void getAllPlayersReload()
      This method will read the data about all player from the database.
      void getSinglePlayerReload​(java.lang.Object obj, int type, Callback callback)
      This method will read the data about a player from the database.
      void removeCode​(GameQRCode oldCode)
      This method will remove the Qrcode from the database or do nothing if the QrCode does not exist in the database

    • Constructor Detail

      • FireDatabase

        public FireDatabase​(java.lang.String uuidInput)
        Constructor method. This constructor method will assign the parameter that is passed into this function to private variables for usage.
        Parameters:
        uuidInput - This is a string representing the identity of the player.

    • Method Detail

      • addOrUpdatePlayer

        public void addOrUpdatePlayer​(Player player)
        This method will update our database when we need to add players to the databse or updated a specific information in the database.
        Parameters:
        player - This is a Player object that needs to be stored or updated from cloud

      • getSinglePlayerReload

        public void getSinglePlayerReload​(java.lang.Object obj,
                                  int type,
                                  Callback callback)
        This method will read the data about a player from the database. and recreate the player object
        Parameters:
        obj - This is a object typed parameter that will be turn into our types of variable in this function
        type - This is an integer indicating few situations that will be handled differently in the function
        callback - This is the callback for getting the reload player

      • getAllPlayersReload

        public void getAllPlayersReload()
        This method will read the data about all player from the database. and recreate the Player object. This is pretty much an extension from the getSinglePlayerReload() function. We use two functions here mainly for clearity and easier debugging access.

      • addNewQRCode

        public void addNewQRCode​(GameQRCode newCode)
        This method will add the new QRCode the player get to the database.
        Parameters:
        newCode - This is a the new QR Code that need to be added in GameQRCode type.

      • removeCode

        public void removeCode​(GameQRCode oldCode)
        This method will remove the Qrcode from the database or do nothing if the QrCode does not exist in the database
        Parameters:
        oldCode - * This parameter is the qrCode object that we want to remove from the cloud
